Traits.Title: Traits
Traits.NoUsesRemaining: No uses remaining for this trait.
Traits.SizeIncompatible: {itemName} ({itemSize}) may not fit properly - your size is {actorSize}.
Traits.KeenSensesDesc: Enhanced senses grant improved perception. Skill Target 5 for Listen and Search checks.
Traits.KeenSensesListenDesc: Exceptional hearing grants improved perception. Skill Target 5 for Listen checks.
Traits.KeenSurvivalDesc: Natural affinity for wilderness survival. Skill Target 5 for Survival checks.
Traits.LonghornGazeDesc: Gaze at a human or shorthorn within sight. Target must Save vs Spell or become charmed with awe/respect until next sunrise. Cannot harm you directly or indirectly while charmed.
Traits.HornAttackDesc: Make a melee attack with your horns. Damage scales with level.
Traits.FurDefenseDesc: +1 AC when unarmoured or wearing light armour due to thick, woolly fur.
Traits.HornLengthDesc: Horns grow with experience. At Level 4 (4" horns), gain official longhorn status and noble recognition.
Traits.UnearthlyBeautyDesc: +2 Charisma (max 18) when interacting with mortals due to your supernatural grace.
Traits.ColdIronVulnDesc: Weapons made from cold iron deal +1 damage against you.
Traits.ImmortalDesc: Cannot die from age, disease, or starvation. Immune to non-magical diseases.
Traits.GlamourDesc: Know one randomly determined glamour (minor fairy magic).
Traits.ListenSearchSkillDesc: Skill Target 5 for Listen and Search checks.
Traits.ShapeShiftChesterDesc: Transform into a fat moggy (domestic cat) form at will. AC 12, Speed 30, bite + 2 claws (1 damage each). Understand speech but can only yowl/meow. Revert when unobserved.
Traits.ShapeShiftWilderDesc: Once per day when in melee and below half HP, transform into fey predator form. Heal 2d6 HP, nearly invisible (opponents -2 Attack), AC 13, bite + 2 claws (1d4 each). Cannot distinguish friend from foe. Lasts 2d4 Rounds.
Traits.HealRodentDesc: Heal 1 HP after spending 1 Turn devouring a freshly killed giant rodent.
Traits.ACVsLargeDesc: +2 AC bonus against Large creatures in melee due to small size.
Traits.SmallSizeDesc: Require specially tailored small-sized armour. Cannot wield Large weapons.
Traits.DecisivenessDesc: When an initiative roll is tied, you act first as if you had won initiative.
Traits.LeadershipDesc: +1 to Loyalty rating of retainers in your employ.
Traits.SpiritedDesc: +10% bonus to all XP earned. Stacks with Prime Ability bonuses.
Traits.KnackDesc: Know one mossling knack (quasi-magical ability chosen at character creation). Abilities unlock at levels 1, 3, 5, and 7.
Traits.ResilienceDesc: +4 bonus to saves against fungal spores and poison. +2 bonus to all other saving throws.
Traits.SymbioticFleshDesc: At each level, gain a random symbiotic trait from the Symbiotic Flesh table (20 possible infestations).
Traits.SurvivalSkillDesc: Skill Target 5 for Survival when foraging.
Traits.EnchantedMelodyDesc: Once per day, play a wind instrument while dancing to affect all living creatures within 30'. Seven melody types: Confide, Dance, Imbibe, Jape, Jubilate, Mount, Revel. Effects persist while playing.
Traits.FairyResistanceDesc: Fairies and demi-fey gain +2 to saves against your enchanted melodies.
Traits.MoonSightDesc: See in darkness up to 60' as though it glows in faint moonlight. Fine details like writing remain imperceptible.
Traits.InstrumentsAsWeaponsDesc: Musical instruments function as melee weapons dealing 1d4 damage.
Traits.WindInstrumentDesc: Begin play with a wind instrument.
Traits.CounterCharmDesc: While playing music and singing, allies within 30' are immune to magical effects based on music/song and gain +2 to saves against fairy magic. Move at half speed, cannot attack.
Traits.EnchantmentDesc: Fascinate creatures within 30' through performance. Uses per day equal to your level. Targets totaling up to twice your level in HD must save or become fascinated, following your movement. After 1 Turn uninterrupted, save again or become charmed.
Traits.BardSkillsDesc: Trained in Decipher Document, Legerdemain, and Monster Lore. Can customize skill advancement.
Traits.TurnUndeadDesc: Present holy symbol to affect undead within 30'. Roll 2d6: 4- no effect, 5-6 stun 2d4 for 1 Round, 7-12 flee 2d4 for 1 Turn, 13+ destroy 2d4. Modifier Â±2 per level difference.
Traits.DetectHolyMagicDesc: Touch an object and concentrate for 1 Turn to identify holy enchantments.
Traits.HolySpellsDesc: Receive blessed spells from the host of saints. Requires carrying a holy symbol.
Traits.LiturgicLanguageDesc: Fluent in the Liturgic language of the Church.
Traits.AlignmentLawNeuDesc: Must be Lawful or Neutral alignment.
Traits.MortalsOnlyDesc: Only mortals can be trained in this class.
Traits.ClericTenetsDesc: Must uphold evangelism, church hierarchy, monotheism, and sanctity of life.
Traits.NoMagicEquipmentDesc: Cannot use arcane or fairy magic weapons/armour. Holy magic items only.
Traits.FairyRunesDesc: Granted use of fairy runes - secret magical sigils guarded by Fairy rulers. Start with one random lesser rune.
Traits.GlamoursDesc: Know minor fairy magical talents. Number known increases with level.
Traits.HolySpellFailureDesc: 2-in-6 chance that beneficial holy spells cast on you have no effect.
Traits.DetectMagicSkillDesc: Sense magical resonances through touch. Takes 1 Turn; automatic with 1 hour of safe solitude.
Traits.FairyDemiFeyOnlyDesc: Typically only fairies and demi-fey (elves, grimalkins, woodgrues) can become enchanters.
Traits.CombatTalentsDesc: Gain combat talents at levels 2, 6, 10, and 14. Choose from: Battle Rage, Cleave, Defender, Last Stand, Leader, Main Gauche, Slayer, Weapon Specialist.
Traits.ArmorOfFaithDesc: Divine blessing grants AC bonus depending on level. Scales from +2 at low levels to +5 at high levels.
Traits.HerbalismDesc: A single medicinal herb dose can treat two subjects instead of one.
Traits.CulinaryImplementsDesc: May employ a frying pan, cured sausage, or ham shank as a melee weapon dealing 1d4 damage.
Traits.FriarTenetsDesc: Must uphold sanctity of life, monotheism, spiritual insight, and mentorship of common folk.
Traits.PovertyVowsDesc: Worldly possessions limited to what can be carried. Excess wealth must be donated.
Traits.BindCompanionDesc: Bond with a single animal through peaceful interaction over 1 Turn. On Charisma Check success, it becomes your loyal companion, understanding commands and fighting without morale checks.
Traits.TrophiesDesc: After slaying a creature, claim a trophy (min 50 coins weight). When carried or mounted at home, grants +1 attack and +1 saves against that creature type.
Traits.WayfindingDesc: 3-in-6 chance to find the path when the party becomes lost.
Traits.MissileBonusDesc: +1 Attack bonus with all missile weapons.
Traits.HunterSkillsDesc: Trained in Alertness, Stalking, and Tracking. Can customize skill advancement.
Traits.AssessSteedDesc: Evaluate a horse's quality, determining if it has low, average, or high HP for its type.
Traits.UrgeSteedDesc: Once per day, urge your steed to great haste, increasing its Speed by 10 for up to 6 Turns.
Traits.MonsterSlayerDesc: +2 bonus to Attack and Damage against Large creatures.
Traits.StrengthOfWillDesc: +2 bonus to saves versus fairy magic and fear effects.
Traits.HospitalityDesc: Rights of hospitality and aid from nobles and knights of the same alignment. Must reciprocate.
Traits.LiegeAlignmentDesc: Alignment must match your liege's alignment.
Traits.NoLightArmorDesc: Light armour is scorned. Must wear medium or heavy armour.
Traits.CodeOfChivalryDesc: Must follow the chivalric code: honour, service, glory, protecting the weak, and hierarchy.
Traits.ArcaneSpellsDesc: Cast arcane spells by memorizing from spell books. Number and rank of spells increases with level.
Traits.BackstabDesc: Strike from behind an unaware target for +4 Attack and 3d4 damage (plus Strength mod). Requires successful Stealth. Limited to Small/Medium targets.
Traits.ThiefSkillsDesc: Trained in Climb Wall, Decipher Document, Disarm Mechanism, Legerdemain, Pick Lock, and Stealth. Can customize advancement.
Traits.CantDesc: Know a secret language of gestures and code words to hide messages in normal conversation.
Traits.MartialCombatDesc: Martial combat aptitude. Access to any armour and weapons.
Traits.SemiMartialCombatDesc: Semi-martial combat aptitude with limited armour and weapon options.
Traits.FurBallDesc: After eating giant rodents, usable 3 times daily. All creatures in a 30' line suffer 1d6 damage.
Traits.LockPickingSkillDesc: Specialized lock-picking skill that improves with level.

Talents.BattleRageDesc: +2 bonus to Attack and Damage Rolls, but -4 penalty to AC and cannot flee until combat ends.
Talents.CleaveDesc: After a killing blow in melee, make an additional attack against another foe at -2 penalty.
Talents.DefenderDesc: Enemy Attack Rolls against allies within melee range suffer -2 penalty.
Talents.LastStandDesc: Continue acting for up to 5 rounds after reaching 0 HP; requires saves against death when damaged.
Talents.LeaderDesc: +1 bonus to Morale/Loyalty for retainers within 60'; allies gain +2 bonus to saves versus fear.
Talents.MainGaucheDesc: With small off-hand weapon, choose each round for +1 AC bonus or +1 Attack bonus.
Talents.SlayerDesc: +1 bonus to Attack and Damage against a chosen enemy type. Can be selected multiple times.
Talents.WeaponSpecialistDesc: +1 bonus to Attack and Damage with a chosen weapon type. Can be selected multiple times.

Orders.stFaxisDesc: +2 bonus to Saving Throws against arcane magic. Arcane opponents suffer -2 to saves against your holy spells.
Orders.stSedgeDesc: Heal up to 1 HP per level total, once daily, by laying on hands.
Orders.stSignisDesc: +1 Attack bonus against undead. Can harm undead that normally require magical weapons.
